attributes.action: 24/7 Police presence in Pocklington, Market Weighton and surrounding areas.
attributes.additional_details: In recent months there appears to be a significant change in the police presence in Pocklington and surrounding villages. many neighbors and businesses report being victims of or witnessing crimes break-ins, stolen vehicles, slashed tires, stolen bicycles and other property, various property crimes, burglary, trespassing, and an overall concerning increase in suspicious activity.The majority of these incidents appears to be made public on Facebook in posts by victims or witnesses to warn others.
attributes.background: Many residents are no longer feeling protected and safe within their own homes,which the tax payers deserve-in a fast growing area like Pocklington. When the police station was open all night long,how many people would have walked in needing help,where will these people go now?It will only get worse
